alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 3:26PM EDT until August 01 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EDT Thursday was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 10 PM EDT.
